content: How it worksGo to blackjack.fun and login into your account. If you don’t have, just create a new account.On the homepage, you can see all the ongoing wagers from hourly to daily.You can vote on who you think it will win the next wager. Use the vote button to vote your guessed winner and wait until each session is over. If your bet is on the winner of the session you will get the free spins. To claim your wins you must access dig dig diggerWinning amount based on wagersWeekly wager competition: 30 free spinsDaily wager competition: 5 free spinsDaily Biggest win competition: 5 free spinsDaily highest win competition: 5 free spinsHourly wager competition: 1 free spinHourly Highest bet competition: 1 free spinThis will sum up to 63 free spins every day or 471 free spins every week**if you vote every hour and you  get all votes rightRulesNo alt accounts are allowed.To avoid exploits a minimum deposit on $1 is mandatory.You cannot participate in the voting competitions without the deposit. You don’t have to wager to withdraw your winnings gained from the free spins.blackjack.fun reserves the right of changing rules, terms, and conditions at any time during this campaign
